snippet: The days of CDs and liner notes are mostly gone, but for those wanting all of the information about the music they listen to, Rhapsody, for one, is now providing digital credits.
abstract: Rhapsody becomes first of streaming music companies to commit to providing liner-note-style digital credits for every track in its catalog of 17 million songs; decision comes after strong urging from the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences.
lead_paragraph: The days of CDs and liner notes are mostly gone, but for those wanting all of the information about the music they listen to, Rhapsody, for one, is now providing digital credits.

headline.seo: Rhapsody’s Move to Liner Notes for Digital Tunes May Set Trend

keywords.value: National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
